news.title: Submission accepted to NeurIPS2025-AI4Science!
news.description: The paper entitled Scaling High-Throughput Experimentation Unlocks Robust Reaction-Outcome Prediction, prepared by Molecule.One team was accepted for poster presentation at NeurIPS2025-AI4Science! Glad to had a small influence on the pipeline!

news.title: Review in Journal of Clinical Medicine
news.description: Our recent review entitled 'Enhancing Image Quality in Dental-Maxillofacial CBCT: The Impact of Iterative Reconstruction and AI on Noise Reductionâ€”A Systematic Review' has been accepted for publication in Journal of Clinical Medicine!

news.title: New Position at Warsaw University of Technology
news.description: I am starting my new position as an Assistant Professor at Warsaw University of Technology from October. New possibilities open!
